title: Introducing: Flower Drums
body:
2014 has belonged to one country – Australia.

A seemingly never ending stream of quality new artists have emerged from down under, particularly amidst their blossoming electronic pop scene. **Flower Drums**, another act to add to the ever growing list, cropped up on my radar a year or so back, and released a new track last month, alongside their most recent offering, _Don’t Wait_, a collaboration with fellow Aussie, [St. South](https://soundcloud.com/stsouth). Gorgeously melodic pop gems, there’s a subtle incandescence to their music; one that we’ve seen to be a recurring theme of the music coming from Australia recently. Check out a few tracks from the quartet below.

A seemingly never ending stream of quality new artists have emerged from down under, particularly amidst their blossoming electronic pop scene. Flower Drums, another act to add to the ever growing list, cropped up on my radar a year or so back, and released a new track \[…\]
